alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Lake County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:13PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lake County through 245 PM PDT... At 213 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lakeview, moving east at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeview, Camas Snow Park, Twin Spring Recreation Site, Rogger Meadow Trailhead and Highway 140 At Warner Mountain Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
